overview: Ha-yoon gave up art for a stable reality rather than a worrying future and chose to live an ordinary life at a marketing company. She lived the path she chose, but her normal life was not smooth. Time often passed in an instant, and I heard a question at a drinking party with my best friend, Da-young, who had not yet given up on art.do.“You liked it more than me. Even if you live a normal life, your expression doesn't look that good.”Ha-yoon feels a sense of separation from the stable path she has chosen for herself. Ha-yoon said that she really is a normal day that she always spends to make sure she is happy in her normal life.smalldecide to deviate The beginning of a childhood memory trip to find your own happiness. Not great scenic days to greet in it. Ha-yoon is greeted by her realization as she chases after the memories of the past.
title: Palette
